actions.description: The narzugon makes three Hellfire Lance attacks. It also uses Infernal Command or Terrifying Command.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature with a soul, the soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.
actions.name: Hellfire Lance

actions.description: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.
actions.name: Infernal Command

actions.description: Each creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that isn't a Fiend must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of the narzugon for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.
actions.name: Terrifying Command

actions.description: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains 100 hit points.
actions.name: Healing (1/Day)

name: Narzugon [MoM]
resistances: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

specialTraits.description: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its nightmare companion as an action.
specialTraits.name: Infernal Tack

specialTraits.description: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
